name: Mylee Ejercito
text: How about the social cost of the orphaned children? The emotional trauma of those who saw their parent(s) gunned down in cold blood? Or do they not count because mahirap lang sila?

source_obj.text: How about the social cost of the orphaned children? The emotional trauma of those who saw their parent(s) gunned down in cold blood? Or do they not count because mahirap lang sila?
